spec_data.Name: php-gecko-packages-gecko-php-unit
spec_data.Description:
Provides additional asserts to be used in PHPUnit tests.
The asserts are provided using Traits so no changes are needed
in the hierarchy of test classes.

Autoloader: /usr/share/php/GeckoPackages/PHPUnit/autoload.php
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 24 Aug 2017 04:04:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
